portrait_l.name: gallahan
portrait_l.sjis: いい鍛冶師になりたいのなら 迷いは禁物だぞ 信じる心が道を切り開くのだ
portrait_l.ascii: If you want to become a great Craftknight, you must not waver. A strong will opens the path.

info.sjis: ギャラハン工房からのお知らせ カウンターに店員がいないときには 勝手に買い物してください
info.ascii: A message from Gallahan's Workshop. If the clerk is not at the counter, please complete your purchase on your own.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_mother
portrait_l.sjis: 私はね、すごい鍛冶師を捜しているの そんな鍛冶師と一緒に商売が出来たら すごく儲かって
portrait_l.ascii: You know, I'm searching for an amazing Craftknight. If I could do business with them, I'd make loads of money

portrait_l.name: peddler's_mother
portrait_l.sjis: 娘にも安心して生活がさせて あげられると思うの
portrait_l.ascii: I could even let my daughter live without worry.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_mother
portrait_l.sjis: どこかに、すごい鍛冶師はいないかな～
portrait_l.ascii: Aren't there any amazing Craftknight's here~?

portrait_l.name: merchant
portrait_l.sjis: どっかに景気のいい話、 落ちてないかな～
portrait_l.ascii: Won't you please have a conversation with me~
